General.Name: Lahontan Gold Corp.
General.Description: Lahontan Gold Corp., a junior resource company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties. The company's flagship asset is Santa Fe Project, located northeast of Luning, Nevada. It also holds interest in the Moho and Redlich projects located in Nevada. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 767 Fifth Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10153
